NeoApplications

There is no descriptions

Currently it serves 4 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://github.com/nonaybay/NeoApplicationsRepository

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
D1 C8 07 8B 7C E5 8D 8F 83 84 EE 13 7D 9B CB 20 71 8E C9 AF 9A 0C 20 8F E2 F9 32 2F 15 8A BB 86
